about_the_game:
In a small isolated village nestled in the middle of the sprawling post-Soviet wilderness, life was hard but simple. The villagers worked hard to survive, relying on each other for support and protection. But everything changed when parasites appeared. No one knows where they came from or how they spread, but one thing was for sure - they were deadly. These parasites could infect humans and other animals by penetrating deep into their bodies and controlling their actions. As they spread, the infected became mindless, brutal monsters that pounced on anyone in their path. Later, different people arrived in the Perimeter and founded groups with different ideologies.

World
Perimeter is a village in Belarus, which is surrounded by large walls. Due to unknown "parasites" the village is under quarantine. On the map there are places of severe infection, the most dangerous places. Such areas are teeming with parasites and the infected.

Laboratories
The Perimeter is full of all sorts of laboratories, the research of which will reveal to you the details of the events of the Perimeter. But know that it is not so easy to research in the laboratory, high risk = high reward.

Flora and Fauna
In addition to ordinary animals, like: pigs, horses, cows, deer, etc. In the Perimeter there are also "infected" - these are former people who were infected with parasites, the infected have 4 stages of infection. And the parasites themselves. From the flora there are infected plants and living infected plants, for example, a beacon that summons parasites.

Factions
Perimeter is full of different people who are united in different groups, everyone has different reasons to be in Perimeter, someone stayed in it when quarantine and evacuation were announced, someone was sent to clean up the area. Factions have different views and attitudes.

Survival
You, like any other person, need food and water, which you will have to extract and purify from infection. There are also crafting and building mechanics. You definitely won't get bored!

Overall, the game will offer a thrilling and immersive survival experience, as the player struggles to stay alive in a world overrun by parasites and the infected.
